title: Madhouse
description: Supernatural historical thriller. 1912: After the death of his uncle, David Bodark is left with an inheritance as unusual as it is intriguing. The key to his family's dark past lies in his hands. But is it worth the cost? Travelling across a continent and fifty-two years back in time, David finds the horrors of the past are not quite dead and buried, and he must face his greatest fears if he is to discover the truth of his ancestors' disappearance. But what precisely was the nature of David's late great-great uncle's experiments? And what of the great black beast that stalked the forests of his native Lukonus? Will David survive to find out?
author: Michael Staniforth
